thread.title: UD's Courtright receives Distinguished Research Fellow Award (University of Delaware)
thread.title_full: UD's Courtright receives Distinguished Research Fellow Award (University of Delaware) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: UD's Courtright receives Distinguished Research Fellow Award (University of Delaware)
text: ( Source : University of Delaware ) 9:34 a.m., Oct. 5, 2015--John Courtright, professor of communication at the University of Delaware, has received the 2015 Distinguished Research Fellow Award from the Eastern Communication Association ( ECA )
